title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2608.2 - Reapplication review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2608.2 - Reapplication review

State Regulations
(a) All
reapplications will be logged in with date received, name of applicant, amount
of funding requested. (b) All
applicants will be sent an acknowledgment letter. (c) Neighborhood preservation companies
submitting incomplete applications will not have their applications evaluated
and may be subject to a delay in funding. (d) Late reapplication submissions may result
in the delay, reduction or loss of funding. (e) All complete applications will be
reviewed for eligibility. Neighborhood preservation companies must recertify
eligibility on an annual basis, using the latest relevant, verifiable data. Significant changes in eligibility data may preclude contract
renewal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2608.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
